price: គឺបណ្ដាអ្នកដែលកោតខ្លាចម្ចាស់របស់ពួកគេដោយអាថ៌កំបាំង ហើយពួកគេខ្លាចថ្ងៃបរលោកបំផុត។
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ مُشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yakhshawna rabbahum bil-ghaybi wahum mina al-sāʿati mush'fiqūna
